MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock affecting properties in Don Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site at Tweed Street and in order to complete repairs on our underground cable network caused by third party damage, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.28pm on Friday 16th October 2020.
